snippet: Peter Story performs in his one-man show about man-woman relationships, adapted from the book by John Gray.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews one-man show Men Are From Mars, Women Are From Venus, Live!, adapted from John Gray book by Eric Coble and starring Peter Story, at New World Stages.
lead_paragraph: Peter Story performs in his one-man show about man-woman relationships, adapted from the book by John Gray.

headline.main: Review: ‘Men Are From Mars, Women Are From Venus, Live!’
headline.print_headline: Your Problem Is, You Love an Alien
